items.title: Utilizing OneNote 2016 to its Fullest
items.headline: Practical Uses & Step by Step Instructions
objectives_summary: At the end of this course you will have the knowledge and skill set to fully utilize OneNote to organize both your personal and professional life.   The skills you take away from this course will allow you to incorporate OneNote's orgainzational capabilities into all aspects of your life -- meetings/class notes (written, audio, video), to do lists (projects, meetings, grocery lists), project planning, party planning...just to name a few.
